docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A gene that puts people at risk of becoming alcoholics has been identified for the first time, scientists report in a study being published today.

headline.main: Scientists See a Link Between Alcoholism And a Specific Gene

docs.snippet: LEAD: A gene that puts people at risk of becoming alcoholics has been identified for the first time, scientists report in a study being published today.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: JOURNAL OF THE AMERICAN MEDICAL ASSN

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The cost of private health insurance for the elderly is rising sharply, straining the budgets of millions of people who live on Social Security checks and fueling demands in Congress and the states for tighter regulation of this insurance.

headline.main: Health Insurers Increase Rates For the Elderly

docs.snippet: LEAD: The cost of private health insurance for the elderly is rising sharply, straining the budgets of millions of people who live on Social Security checks and fueling demands in Congress and the states for tighter regulation of this insurance.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: DOCTORS were not exactly astonished when a report last week in the British journal Lancet showed that lowering blood pressure reduces the risk of heart attack. What seemed remarkable was that for years scientists had been unable to find a shred of evidence for what cardiologists intuitively assumed was true.

headline.main: In Clinical Trials, Some Contend, Big Is Beautiful
